revision.text:
'''DMapEdit''' is a Doom, Heretic, and Hexen [[level editor]] with support for ZDoom. It is by "Bruce" and is no longer maintained. It runs only under DOS mode and compared to other editors is outdated. The newest version is v4.3, released 01/05/01.
==External links== * [http://www.doomworld.com/idgames/index.php?id=11052 DMapEdit on /idgames] [[Category:Level editors]][[Category:Tools]]
